Reference / API¶

Simulation¶

Simulator(param_dic)

Simulation class using a config file config.yml.

OpenSim(sim_file[, model_dir])

This class allow to open simulation file, make plot and run the fit.

sim_class

This module contains the class which are used in the simulation.

sim_class.SN(sn_par, sim_model, model_par)

This class represent SN object.

sim_class.SnGen(sn_int_par, model_config, …)

This class set up the random part of the SN simulation.

sim_class.SurveyObs(survey_config)

This class deals with the observations of the survey.

sim_class.SurveyFields(fields_dic, ra_size, …)

Fields properties object.
